name: Avoid unreferenced Logical file  (DDS400)
description: This rule searches for all the unreferenced logical  files.
output:
This report lists DDS400 unreferenced logical File.
It provides the following information:
DDS400 Logical File full name
rationale:
Unreferenced Logical files may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.

Warning:
Unreferenced code can also be the symptoms of missing code
remediation: Check if the unreferenced Logical files is not the symptome of missing code and if it is not the case, remove them.
remediationSample:
Reduce number of unreferenced logical files. Logical file are referred in RPG programs in following way

FMYFILE IF E DISK INFDS(FILEFBK)
total: Total number of DDS400 Logical File
